author: DryRun
body: Adds "LSmod60" versions of the bad capid and LED misfire vs LS plots, which only record the last 60 LSes. This is so that the error condition goes away after ~25 minutes, so the sound alarms don't keep triggering.
title: HCALDQM: bad capid/LED misfire sound alarms only for last 60 LSes (10_3_X)
